items.headline: I’m being forced into a Roth 401(k). Is there anything I can do?
items.summary_en: High earners have to pay tax on their catch-up 401(k) contributions and deposit them into workplace Roth accounts.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Siemens boosts outlook as AI orders pour in and its software business defies gloom
items.summary_en: Siemens, Germany’s largest industrial that builds the power distribution systems and cooling systems that are required for state-of-the-art data centers, on Thursday lifted its profit outlook.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I’m a loner’: I’m 62 with a multimillion-dollar portfolio and no heirs. Should I find a wife for my twilight years?
items.summary_en: “I have never been married, have no siblings, and both my parents have passed away.”

items.headline: Racing legend Hurley Haywood lists his home in St. Augustine, Florida, for $5.2 million
items.summary_en: Former race car driver Hurley Haywood is offloading his sprawling Florida mansion for $5.2 million, more than a decade after he retired to the Sunshine State property.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Scared to invest in emerging-market bonds? If you hold U.S. Treasurys, then you already do.
items.summary_en: The biggest difference these days between U.S. Treasurys and official emerging-market bonds is that Treasurys pay you a lot less interest.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Currency strategist who incurred Bessent’s wrath exposes safe-haven myth of the dollar
items.summary_en: The Deutsche Bank strategist who last month provoked the ire of Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent now says the dollar’s safe-haven status is a myth.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: SoftBank says it made $4.2 billion from its OpenAI investment in the last quarter
items.summary_en: SoftBank, the Japanese tech investor that has aggressively spent pursuing what it calls “artificial super intelligence,” said its recorded a $4.2 billion gain in the last quarter on its 11% stake in OpenAI.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: One of Europe’s few growth stocks falters on disappointing outlook
items.summary_en: Shares of Adyen, one of Europe’s few high-growth tech stocks, slumped on Wednesday after outlining revenue growth that disappointed investors and forecasting steady margins.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: A 222-year-old U.K. firm to fall into American hands as Nuveen to buy Schroders for $14 billion
items.summary_en: A venerable City of London institution is being snapped up by a U.S. asset manager in a nearly $14 billion deal that comes amid growing fears that AI will severely disrupt the finance sector.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: 20 stocks of companies that delivered a double dose of growth this earnings season
items.summary_en: Companies in the S&P 500 achieving double-digit sales growth while improving profit margins include Palantir, Micron, Boeing and Alphabet.
